attributes.action: reduce airfuel taxation on airlines and cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reduce FUEL Tax for people going on holidays   by airplane & car ....   and give the british people a break from our TAX burdened lives

rejection.details:
Airline fuel tax is levied by airlines.
http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=fuel+duty&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=fuel+tax&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
